About Us
About Us
Welcome to
Doucè Restaurant & Lounge
Welcome to Doucè Restaurant and Lounge, where our motto is Sweet life, Sweet time. We are centrally located in Miramar Florida. 2460 South State Road 7. Whether it’s relaxing with our signature cocktails or taking in the scenery with our outdoor seating. Our diverse menu will tickle your fancy. We offer a fusion of Hispanic and Carribean cooking. At Doucè we have the hottest dj’s to spark your fun times. Outstanding customer service is our mission. Catering service available, in addition venue rental can be arranged.
